entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Automate workload drop creation to streamline insertion process #36442
  • `dotnet --info` should not cause a worklog log to be emitted #36441
  • ECDsa.TrySignData(...) returns true, with bytes written == 64 for null values #36439
  • `dotnet tool restore` installing wrong version specified in `dotnet-tools.json` #36434
  • dotnet restore crashes with internal CLR error #36417

Closed

  • Disabling first run welcome message? #10411
    Discussion
  • Referencing a .net7.0-windows project from a net7.0 project when ReferenceOutputAssembly == false results in build error #36352

PullRequests

Created

  • update change to test for deadlocks for packageInstall #36443
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.2xx' => 'main' #36440
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • upgrade stage 0 and unwind a few steps that were done for the 9.0 upg… #36437
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Improve rude edit and error handling #36401
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Reduce test timeout to speed up timeouts. #36090
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update change to test for deadlocks in `packageInstall` #36393
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove the extra diag output #36115
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/8.0.1xx] Stabilize package versions #36433
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.2xx' => 'main' #36396
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Workload history #34946
    untriaged, Area-Workloads, 8.0.2xx
  • Create project templates target to 9.0 #34996
    untriaged, Area-Common templates
  • add packagesprops template #36387
    untriaged, Area-dotnet new
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.2xx' #36386
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • APICompat & GenAPI clean-up #36353
    Area-ApiCompat, Area-GenAPI
  • Add dotnet package search #36289
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
